name: Dice Wheat Me
description:
A strategy game with a hint of management game, with d20!

Main structures:

- Shelter
- Farm
- Barracks
- Market

Shelter - Recovers Farmers' HPs after the turn
Barracks - Improves Farmers' Modifiers after the turn
Farm - Yields Wheat after the turn
Market - Sells Wheat for Coins after the turn
Lot - Empty space to build structures (except Shelter)

Don't let the events destroy your shelter and leave you with no farmers!

Change Log:

- "Main Menu" button in the end-year screen not working
